title: CareerGuide.com Appoints Former WizIQ Marketer as Digital Chief Marketing Officer
text:
Monday, October 19, 2015 2:36PM IST (9:06AM GMT) CareerGuide.com Appoints Former WizIQ Marketer as Digital Chief Marketing Officer New Delhi, Delhi, India 
CareerGuide.com has appointed Amarjeet Sharma as the Digital Chief Marketing Officer. He was leading the Online Marketing operations of WizIQ and has an illustrative background of formerly working with top online businesses like PayPal, Barnes & Noble, GemsNY, Gaadi, India Today Group, Info Edge Group, SugarCRM, Shopify and many more. He is tasked to spearhead the marketing and advertising responsibilities in the organization and setting up new milestones for growth and leading CareerGuide’s ventures into new markets globally. Commenting on the recent appointment of Mr. Sharma, Ms. Surabhi Dewra, Founder & CEO of CareerGuide.com said, “Amarjeet, brings more than a decade of industry experience in Digital Marketing and we are confident about its success in CareerGuide.com. He brings with him the go-to-market experience to ensure our base within Indian edtech startups. Moreover his experience of leading the online marketing of WizIQ.com will be an added advantage. He also has a strategic advantage of being a team player and has the vision to redefine these markets to fast forward the organization. ”“Youth today are facing a great challenge to get proper career direction due to lack of mentorship or misleading information.” said Amarjeet. “CareerGuide.com is here to address this problem by providing answers to their career related queries and creating a bridge between the aspirant and career experts. And such innovation is the need of the hour in any country, especially in country such as ours where more than 50% population is youth and in the onset of their career. I welcome this opportunity to contribute to the company’s growth story.” Mr. Amarjeet Sharma is all set to take his roles and responsibilities at CareerGuide.com. With around 14 years of experience in marketing, he has invested more than 10 years in Conceptualization and Implementation of digital & marketing transformation. Prior to joining CareerGuide.com he was leading the online marketing of WizIQ as Senior Manager of Online Marketing. Mr. Sharma is a keen strategist with intensive expertise in managing digital marketing for online customer products and services businesses and digital transformation projects worldwide. About Carerrguide.com:- Careerguide.com provides an “On Demand” career guidance system where an aspirant is match to a counselor by it unique algorithm to its ever growing panel of experts and connected instantaneously. It presently has 200+ Career Counselors on its panel and offers 504 Career Options to students from across the country. It is that one-stop destination which helps an aspirant to seek right career guidance from career experts. An aspirant can get instant answers of their career related queries vide Live Call sessions with their career experts and/or Q&A forum. Ms. Surabhi Dewra, Co-Founder and CEO is an entrepreneur cum educationist with 8+ years of experience. She comes with her natural flair for leadership and creativity and takes pride in her venture "Careerguide.com".
